channel.title: Just a little help,,,,,
channel.description: how do i stop massers i know i need to add a anti mass code or something but idk what please help me stop them MASSERS!!!

item.title: Just a little help,,,,,
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Change the actionTimer to how many seconds you want it for them to be able to click.

Like if the ActionTimer is 10, they can mass all they want, just there char wont hit the object until those 10 seconds are over.

if(actionTimer == 10) {

Read full topic
